sentences.cn: 披头士乐队歌曲大联唱

sentences.en: A: And the order in medley relays?
sentences.cn: 混合 泳 接力赛的顺序又是怎样的 呢 ?

sentences.en: China won the Men's 200 metres Individual Medley.
sentences.cn: 中国赢得了男子200米个人混合泳比赛。

sentences.en: E best of john denver live albums as a medley.
sentences.cn: 电子约翰丹佛最佳专辑作为生活组曲.

sentences.en: He won the 400 m individual medley, 4 x 100 m freestyle relay and the 200 m freestyle earlier this week.
sentences.cn: 他在本周此前的400米个人混合泳, 4乘100米自由泳接力和200米自由泳的比赛中夺金.

sentences.en: Hey guys , This is a medley of some old and new songs.
sentences.cn: 请你看一下. 这首歌是我最喜欢的!

sentences.en: Is Lewes going to enter the man's 200 meter medley relay?
sentences.cn: 刘易斯准备参加男子200米混合接力赛 吗 ?

sentences.en: Is Liu Wei going to enter the man's 400 - metre medley relay?
sentences.cn: 刘伟准备参加男子400米混合接力赛 吗 ?

sentences.en: It was a medley of levies.
sentences.cn: 这是征募来的一支杂凑军.

sentences.en: J : It'sounds great. Do you know the order of medley relays?
sentences.cn: 听起来不错, 你知道混合泳接力赛的顺序 吗 ?

sentences.en: Klochkova captured the 200 individual medley in a time of 2:11.14.
sentences.cn: 克洛奇科娃以2:11.14的成绩取得了200米个人混合泳的冠军.

sentences.en: On Sunday, he won the 200-meter individual medley and said he needs more practice.
sentences.cn: 星期天，他赢得了200米个人混合泳，并表示他需要更多的练习。

sentences.en: On that note, Organic Orchard Medley is surprisingly good.
sentences.cn: 在那笔记上, 器官的果园杂集令人惊讶地好.

sentences.en: She came in with the world record in the 400 individual medley but settled for bronze.
sentences.cn: 而在400米个人混合泳的比赛中，她破了世界纪录却还是只获得了银牌。

sentences.en: She swam the 400 metres medley ten seconds slower than she did in 1980.
sentences.cn: 她400米混合泳的成绩比其1980年慢了10秒。

sentences.en: The start in freestyle, Breaststroke, Butterfly and individual medley races shall be with a dive.
sentences.cn: 自由游 、 蛙游 、 蝶游和个人混合游的出发方式是跳入水中出发.

sentences.en: What do you mean by individual medley?
sentences.cn: 你说的个人混合泳是什么意思?

sentences.en: Yes. In medley relays, each swimmer swims one stroke for the set distance; the order is back-stroke, breast-stroke, butterfly and freestyle.
sentences.cn: 是的，在混合泳接力赛中，每位运动员以一种姿势游一定距离，顺序依次是斧正游泳、蛙泳、蝶泳和自由泳。

phrases.tran_cn: 个人混合泳，个人混和式

trans.tran_cn: 混杂物，混合物，杂录，[体]混合径赛，混战
trans.tran_en: a mixture of different types of the same thing which produces an interesting or unusual effect
